results.name: E.g.f.: exp(x/(1+x)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..450

formula: Let E(x) be the e.g.f., then
E(x) = 1/G(0) where G(k)= 1 - x/((1+x)*(2*k+1) - x*(1+x)*(2*k+1)/(x - (1+x)*(2*k+2)/G(k+1))); (continued fraction, 3rd kind, 3-step).
E(x) = 1 + x/(G(0)-x) where G(k)= 1 + 2*x + (1+x)*k - x*(1+x)*(k+1)/G(k+1); (continued fraction, Euler's 1st kind, 1-step).
E(x) = G(0) where G(k)= 1 + x/((1+x)*(2*k+1) - x*(1+x)*(2*k+1)/(x + 2*(1+x)*(k+1)/G(k+1))); (continued fraction, 3rd kind, 3-step).
E.g.f.: 1 + x*(E(0)-1)/(x+1) where E(k) = 1 + 1/(k+1)/(1+x)/(1-x/(x+1/E(k+1) )); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jan 27 2013
E.g.f.: E(0)/2, where E(k)= 1 + 1/(1 - x/(x + (k+1)*(1+x)/E(k+1) )); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jul 31 2013
a(n) = sum(k=0..n, (-1)^(n-k)*L(n,k)); L(n,k) the unsigned Lah numbers. - _Peter Luschny_, Oct 18 2014
mathematica: nn=30; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[x/(1+x)],{x,0,nn}], x] Range[0,nn]! (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 21 2011 *)
xref: Unsigned row sums of A111596: A000262.
